result.reason: Implement a visual notification system on connection tabs to alert users to events of interest related to a specific connection, such as status changes or new data.
result.approach: Introduce a new property or method in `ConnectionTab.cs` to manage the visual display of a notification (e.g., background color change, icon, or bolded text). Integrate this functionality into `ConnectionWindow.cs` to allow triggering and clearing these notifications dynamically based on relevant connection-related events.
